CREATE TABLE system."IndexInfo" (
    table_name text,
    index_name text,
    value blob,
    PRIMARY KEY (table_name, index_name)
) WITH read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND gc_grace_seconds = 0
   AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
   AND caching = { 'keys' : 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition' : 'NONE' }
   AND comment = 'built column indexes'
   AND compaction = { 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold' : 32, 'min_threshold' : 4 }
   AND compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb' : 64, 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128
   AND max_index_interval = 2048
   AND crc_check_chance = 1.0;

   AND compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb' : 64, 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128
   AND max_index_interval = 2048
   AND crc_check_chance = 1.0;

 size_estimates

Column Type Column Name Data Type
keyspace_name text
  table_name text
  range_start text
  range_end text
mean_partition_size bigint
partitions_count bigint
As CQL statement 

CREATE TABLE system.size_estimates (
    keyspace_name text,
    table_name text,
    range_start text,
    range_end text,
    mean_partition_size bigint,
    partitions_count bigint,
    PRIMARY KEY (keyspace_name, table_name, range_start, range_end)
) WITH read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND gc_grace_seconds = 0
   AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
   AND caching = { 'keys' : 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition' : 'NONE' }
   AND comment = 'per-table primary range size estimates'
   AND compaction = { 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold' : 32, 'min_threshold' : 4 }
   AND compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb' : 64, 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128
   AND max_index_interval = 2048
   AND crc_check_chance = 1.0;

 sstable_activity

Column Type Column Name Data Type

rate_120m double
rate_15m double
As CQL statement 

CREATE TABLE system.sstable_activity (
    keyspace_name text,
    columnfamily_name text,
    generation int,
    rate_120m double,
    rate_15m double,
    PRIMARY KEY ((keyspace_name, columnfamily_name, generation))
) WITH read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND gc_grace_seconds = 0
   AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
   AND caching = { 'keys' : 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition' : 'NONE' }
   AND comment = 'historic sstable read rates'
   AND compaction = { 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold' : 32, 'min_threshold' : 4 }
   AND compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb' : 64, 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128
   AND max_index_interval = 2048
   AND crc_check_chance = 1.0;

CREATE TABLE system.transferred_ranges (
    operation text,
    keyspace_name text,
    peer inet,
    ranges set<blob>,
    PRIMARY KEY ((operation, keyspace_name), peer)
) WITH read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND gc_grace_seconds = 0
   AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01
   AND caching = { 'keys' : 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition' : 'NONE' }
   AND comment = 'record of transferred ranges for streaming operation'
   AND compaction = { 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold' : 32, 'min_threshold' : 4 }
   AND compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb' : 64, 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128
   AND max_index_interval = 2048
   AND crc_check_chance = 1.0;

    view_name text,
    start_token text,

    keys_built bigint,
    last_token text,
    PRIMARY KEY (keyspace_name, view_name, start_token, end_token)
) WITH read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.0
   AND gc_grace_seconds = 0
   AND bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01

   AND comment = 'views builds current progress'
   AND compaction = { 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold' : 32, 'min_threshold' : 4 }
   AND compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb' : 64, 'class' : 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' }
   AND default_time_to_live = 0
   AND speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE'
   AND min_index_interval = 128

   AND crc_check_chance = 1.0;
